evidence.source_document: Order on Cross-Motions for Summary Judgment
evidence.text: a permanent injunction: [P]rohibiting the Defendants . . . from any enforcement or application of the exclusion of surgeries for 'sex gender change' in 10 U.S.C. § 1079(a)(11), including surgeries for gender dysphoria, through regulations, policies or any other means, and directing Defendants to provide TRICARE coverage for Plaintiffs Jane Doe and Susan Roe's medically necessary gender affirming surgical procedures.

extracted.value: permanent: prohibiting the Defendants from any enforcement or application of the exclusion of surgeries for 'sex gender change' in 10 U.S.C. § 1079(a)(11), including surgeries for gender dysphoria, through regulations, policies or any other means, and directing Defendants to provide TRICARE coverage for Plaintiffs Jane Doe and Susan Roe's medically necessary gender affirming surgical procedures.
